Title: Famous people, famous words -- Zhou Enlai
Designer: Guan Xueming (关学明)Wang Naixin (王乃欣)
Publisher: Neimenggu daxue chubanshe (内蒙古大学出版社)
Notes: "Famous people, famous words" is an educational series from 1996, presenting a number of famous persons, both Chinese and foreign, and their famous utterances. This quote from Zhou Enlai reads "We love our nation, this is the source of our self-confidence" (Women ai womende minzu, zhe shi women zi xin de quanyuan, 我们爱我们的民族，这是我们自信心的泉源). It is a quote from Zhou's "Report on Peace Negotiations" from April 1949.
